channel.title: Gen-Ai on Gurpreet's thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Gen-Ai on Gurpreet's thoughts

item.title: Thoughts on working with Agents
item.description:
• Type: Live post
  • Last updated: 6 July, 2025

Software engineering is evolving 1, quite rapidly while at it. While I do fear for my job and what impacts AI might have on me, I cannot say that some part of this AI wave haven’t been fun. LLMs and Agents have become a crucial part of my workflow and I’ve found myself relying on them much more than I imagined I would. I use Claude/Claude Code as my daily driver, with Gemini as fallback for one-off chat scenarios or for rare cases requiring it’s generous context window.
